wikipedia.title: Trans Europ Express (disambiguation)
wikipedia.extract:
Trans Europ Express is a former international train network in Europe.
It may also refer to:

Trans-Europ-Express (film) (French: Trans-Europ-Express), a 1966 film written and directed by Alain Robbe-Grillet
Trans-Europe Express (album) (German: Trans Europa Express), The Kraftwerk album
"Trans-Europe Express" (song) (German: Trans-Europa Express), The Kraftwerk single
